Department of Mathematics

  The Department of Mathematics was started in 1964 and it was upgraded into a PG department in 2010 and has been recognized as research centre since 2019. It produces very good results in the University level examinations and has 11 University rank holders since 2000 to its credit. Staff members have published more than 200 research papers in reputed National/International journals and four of them have been recognized as approved research guide for Ph.D programme and seven Research Scholars are pursuing their work.

   Mathematics for Competitive Examinations is offered as as add-on certificate course. A good number of alumini of the department are occupying high positions in several Institutions/Industries. Staff members serve as a board of studies members, Resoruce persons for several seminars and conferences, Referee and editor in chief for reputed journals and authored books for B.Sc Mathematics.
